mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT.nextVal AS SERIAL FROM DUAL
insert into TBL_ACCOUNT_MANAGE_HISTORY ( ID,TRADE_FLOW_ID,initiator,create_date,serial_num,operate_type,account_no,changed_value ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeFlowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initiator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=com.esinotrans.payment.account.enums.AccountOperationEnum}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changedValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
